text:
Here Are New Pictures & Videos From Akash Ambani-Shloka Mehta's Grand Swiss Party!
Here Are New Pictures & Videos From Akash Ambani-Shloka Mehta's Grand Swiss Party!
Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta’s pre-wedding celebration in Switzerland was a grand affair. Remember at Isha Ambani’s wedding, Beyonce had a performed in a private concert for the guests. For Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta’s pre-wedding festivities, Coldplay and Chainsmokers had performed. Take a look!
Shah Rukh Khan couldn’t stop grooving to the tunes of Coldplay.
Here’s how the Sangeet Night went by!
Mukesh Ambani grooved to Aye Meri Zohra Jabeen with wife Nita Ambani.
What’s more? Aamir also shook a leg with Shloka Mehta!
Don't Miss 336 SHARES 343 SHARES 247 SHARES 555 SHARES
Here are some more videos and pics!
Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta will tie the knot on March 9 in Mumbai.
title: Here Are New Pictures & Videos From Akash Ambani-Shloka Mehta's Grand Swiss Party!
